item.title: CVE-2022-22113|2024-09-17T02:31:21.087Z -- bottelet -- daybydaycrm
item.description: In DayByDay CRM, versions 2.2.0 through 2.2.1 (latest) are vulnerable to Insufficient Session Expiration. When a password has been changed by the user or by an administrator, a user that was already logged in, will still have access to the application even after the password was changed.
